Memurai 4.1 release notes
================================================================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Upgrade urgency levels:

LOW:      No need to upgrade unless there are new features you want to use.
MODERATE: Program an upgrade of the server, but it's not urgent.
HIGH:     There is a critical bug that may affect a subset of users. Upgrade!
CRITICAL: There is a critical bug affecting MOST USERS. Upgrade ASAP.
SECURITY: There are security fixes in the release.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.2    Released Nov 19 2025
================================================================================

Upgrade urgency: HIGH.

Memurai 4.2.2 is on par with Redis 7.4.7. For details, see:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redis/redis/7.4.7/00-RELEASENOTES

This release introduces the following changes:

* Fix for an overflow in 'HyperLogLog' with 2GB+ entries that may result in
  a crash.
* Fix for installer failing on some systems when installing Memurai with
  a Windows Service

================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.2    --- End of Release Notes ---
================================================================================


================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.1    Released Oct 09 2025
================================================================================

Upgrade urgency: SECURITY.

Memurai 4.2.1 is on par with Redis 7.4.6. For details, see:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redis/redis/7.4.6/00-RELEASENOTES

This release introduces the following changes:

Security fixes:

* (CVE-2025-49844) A Lua script may lead to remote code execution
* (CVE-2025-46817) A Lua script may lead to integer overflow and potential RCE
* (CVE-2025-46818) A Lua script can be executed in the context of another user
* (CVE-2025-46819) LUA out-of-bound read
* (CVE-2025-32023) Fix out-of-bounds write in `HyperLogLog` commands
* (CVE-2025-48367) Retry accepting other connections even if the accepted connection reports an error

Bug fixes:

* Full replica synchronization could leave an additional RDB file in
  the working directory.

================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.1    --- End of Release Notes ---
================================================================================


================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.0    Released Apr 30 2025
================================================================================

Upgrade urgency: LOW. First release of Memurai 4.2.
Memurai 4.2.0 is on par with Redis 7.4.3. For details, see:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redis/redis/7.4.3/00-RELEASENOTES

Introduction to the Memurai 4.2 release
=======================================

Memurai 4.2 brings compatibility with Redis 7.4 API and includes a number of
optimizations, bug fixes and new commands.

In particular, users should be aware of the following:

* Memurai 4.2 requires license file for operation. Memurai is bundled with
  a license intended for development and testing that will be loaded by default.
  Refer to the documentation at docs.memurai.com for details on how to use
  license files and how to obtain a commercial license.

================================================================================
Memurai 4.2.0    --- End of Release Notes ---
================================================================================
